column1: What is your role in respect to this website?
I am the owner of the business, organization or idea the website supports
I am an employee or member of the business, organization or idea the website supports
Please choose the following category that best fits the purpose of your website:
Commercial - the site was built to support a business or sell products or services
Civic â€“ the site focuses on issues, politics, campaigns, advocacy groups, etc. that affect a larger group of people
Community â€“ the site supports social activities such as hobbies, sports teams, entertainment, religious institutions, etc. (but not a for-profit business offering these activities)
Personal â€“ the site focuses on me, my family, my interests or my career
In total, how many employees are there working at your organization?
Which of the following best describes the main industry sector your organization operates in
What would you say were the 3 biggest challenges you faced when you first started the business?  Please rank them from 1 to 3.
Health and other benefits for me and/or employees
Expertise on business planning and management
Opportunities to network with other busniness owners
What are the three most important resources you would need to grow right now?  Please rank them from 1 to 3.
Health and other benefits for me and/or employees
Expertise on business planning and management
Opportunities to network with other busniness owners
Thinking about the business or organization your website supports, where do you conduct business or services?
Both online and in a physical location
Do you see conducting business or service online/physical/both changing in the next six months?
In addition to your website, do you use any of the following for your online commerce or store?
Do you use any of the following social media for marketing/customer generation?
Do you use any of these social media platforms for commerce (instead of or in addition to) marketing?
Do activities related to this website provide a source of income for you?
Yes, my main source of income
Yes, a supplemental source of income
No, I do not receive any income related to this website
If your venture is only for supplemental income, do you hope it turns into full-time employment or a major source of income?
When did you start working on this venture?
How many hours per week, on average, do you currently spend on your ventures?
Do you anticipate this amount increasing or decreasing in the next 3 months?
Do you consider your venture as:
A second job or side employment
Volunteer work, a hobby or an interest rather than employment
What was the total amount of capital needed to start your business or organization?
Were you employed before you started your venture?
Yes, I was already employed when I made the decision to leave and start my venture
Yes, I started my venture on the side while still working elsewhere
No, I wasn't working at the time because I was laid off or furloughed when I made the decision to start my venture
No, I wasn't working at the time because I was a student when I made the decision to start my venture
No, I wasn't working at the time for other reasons (retirement, parenting, disability, etc.)
What is your employment situation now ?
I am fully employed by my venture
I am employed full-time outside of my venture
I am employed part-time outside of my venture
I am employed in multiple part-time jobs/businesses
Outside of working on my venture, I am a homemaker or stay at home parent
Outside of working on my venture, I am retired
Outside of working on my venture, I am a student
Outside of working on my venture, I am unemployed
Outside of working on my venture, I am unable to find work due to a disability
I did have employment outside of my venture, but was laid-off
If you were going to tell your local government how they can help ventures like yours to be successful, what three things should they consider?  Please rank them 1 to 3.
Affordable options for health insurance and other benefits
A skilled workforce in the community
Opportunities to network with other business owners
For many, the Coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19) has had a profound impact. Which of the following ways has it affected your venture?
It forced me to shut down my business or organization permanently
It forced me to shut down my business or organization temporarily
It forced me to shift activity I usually conduct offline to an online mode
It made me expand what I was already doing online
It forced me to lay off or furlough some or all of my employees
It led to a reduction in my business revenues
It led to an increase in my business revenues
It has not affected my business or organization
Did you at any point move from working in an office or other professional space to working from home because of COVID-19?
What difference, if any, does having a website make for your business or organization with COVID-19?
It helped me shift more business or activities online
It helped me communicate changes to customers or participants
It helped me to market my business or organization to new people
It helped me start a new business without having to rent space or buy equipment right away
Did you apply for government assistance from the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) related to COVID-19?
Did your business or organization receive government assistance from the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP)?
I did receive assistance, it was very helpful
I did receive assistance, it was somewhat helpful
I did receive assistance, it was not helpful
I did receive assistance, it was not helpful at all
Did your business or organization receive assistance related to COVID-19 from your state and/or local government?
I did receive information from them about federal programs
I did receive help from them to apply for federal programs
I did receive state or local grants or loans
I did receive state or local tax breaks
I did receive other state or local assistance
I did not receive any state or local assistance
What is your overall expectation for your business or organization over the next 3 months?
What is your overall expectation for your state's economy over the next 3 months?
We are interested in knowing more about our customers.  Please tell us whether you are:
In what year were you born?
Have you ever served in any branch of the Armed Forces, including the Coast Guard, National Guard, or a Reserve for any branch of service?
Are you of Hispanic origin or descent, such as Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, or some other Spanish background?
Were you born in the United States or in another country?
What is the last year of school or degree that you completed?
High school graduate (Grade 12 or GED certificate)
Technical, trade, or vocational school AFTER high school
Some college, no 4-year degree (including Associate's Degree)
College graduate (B.S., B.A., or other 4-year degree)
Graduate degree (Master's Degree or Ph.D.; law or medical school)
